aima.core.probability.temporal

Interface ForwardStepInference

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ForwardBackwardInference
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardBackward, HMMForwardBackward, HMMForwardBackwardConstantSpace

    public interface ForwardStepInference
    * The FORWARD operator is defined by Equation (15.5).
     P(Xt+1 | e1:t+1) 
 = αP(et+1 | Xt+1)∑xtP(Xt+1 | xt, e1:t)P(xt | e1:t)
 = αP(et+1 | Xt+1)∑xtP(Xt+1 | xt)P(xt | e1:t) (Markov Assumption)
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

      CategoricalDistribution forward(CategoricalDistribution f1_t, java.util.List<AssignmentProposition> e_tp1)
